text: Liberty Heights is a 1999 American comedy-drama movie. It was directed by Barry Levinson and was produced by both Barry Levinson and Paula Weinstein. Liberty Heights was released on November 17, 1999. The movie was written by Levinson and it is semi-autobiographical account of his time growing up in Baltimore during the 1950s. The movie gained positive reviews from critics and holds a 87% rating on Rotten Tomatoes. == Cast == * Adrien Brody as Van * Ben Foster as Ben * Orlando Jones as Little Melvin * Bebe Neuwirth as Ada * Joe Mantegna as Nate * Rebekah Johnson as Sylvia * David Krumholtz as Yussel * Justin Chambers as Trey * Carolyn Murphy as Dubbie * Kevin Sussman as Alan * Shane West as Ted * Anthony Anderson as Scribbles * Elizabeth Ann Bennett as Mary * Carlton J Smith as James Brown ==References== == Other websites == * Category:1999 comedy-drama movies Category:American comedy-drama movies Category:English-language movies Category:Movies set in Maryland Category:Movies set in the 1950s Category:Warner Bros. movies Category:Movies directed by Barry Levinson
title: Liberty Heights
